Constituent.Name: Nitrogen
Constituent.Description: 2002 Total Nitrogen Model for Northeast and Mid Atlantic Regions

Source.Name: Municipal Point Source
Source.Description: Nitrogen mass in permitted wastewater discharge

Source.Name: Manure
Source.Description: Nitrogen mass in manure from livestock production

Source.Name: Fertilizer Other
Source.Description: Nitrogen mass in commercial fertilizer applied to agricultural land in other crops

CommonTerms.Term:
Each model has different sources that the modeler has determined to be statistically significant. Choose a source from the list to present data only from that source. This model contains these sources:
All Not really a separate source, it just tallies all the sources together. Reported in kg. Municipal Point Source Nitrogen mass in permitted wastewater discharge Fert/Fix from Corn-Soy-Alfalfa Nitrogen mass in commercial fertilizer applied to agricultural land in corn / soybeans / alfalfa Atmospheric TIN Inorganic nitrogen detrended to 2002 conditions. Manure Nitrogen mass in manure from livestock production Developed Land Area of developed land Fertilizer Other Nitrogen mass in commercial fertilizer applied to agricultural land in other crops
